question: What is the name of the firm accused by India for illegally harvesting personal information from Facebook?
explanation: Cambridge Analytica is a data analytics and political consulting firm set up in 2014, launched with the help of Steve Bannon, former chief strategist to U.S. President Donald Trump and former head of the alt-right media platform. Recently, Union IT minster Ravi Shankar Prasad accused Cambridge Analytica for illegally harvesting personal information from Facebook for influencing polls in several countries
